briefTitle: Safety Study of Arformoterol Tartrate Inhalation Solution in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Subjects
officialTitle: A Large Simple Safety Study of Arformoterol Tartrate Inhalation Solution in Subjects With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
summary: This is a multi-center study to evaluate the long-term safety of arformoterol 15 mcg twice daily (BID) in the treatment of subjects with moderate-to-severe COPD. Study participation will consist of a total of 6 visits over approximately 1 year.

primaryOutcome.measure: Time From Randomization to Respiratory Death or First COPD Exacerbation Related Hospitalization (Whichever Occurs First).
